Doc 18: Customer Success & Transformational Value ‚Äã

Executive Summary: This playbook outlines our customer engagement strategy, focusing on self-service resources and community building. It now includes a dedicated section for "Transformational Case Studies," which serve as powerful, data-driven proof of our value proposition for both new customers and investors.

Last Reviewed: 2025-11-20 Document Owner: Head of Customer Success

English ‚Äã

1. Customer Support Channels ‚Äã

  • Urgent Issues: [email protected]
  • General Questions: In-App Chat or the Community Forum.
  • Enterprise Support: Dedicated Account Manager.

2. Self-Service Knowledge Base ‚Äã

  • Public Knowledge Base: [Link to Help Center / Notion] with Quick Start Guides, Best Practices, and a searchable FAQ.

3. Transformational Case Studies & Testimonials ‚Äã

This is the core of proving our value. We move beyond simple quotes to data-driven success stories.

Case Study: "Productora de Aguacates de Michoac√°n" ‚Äã

  • The Challenge: The producer faced a 17% rejection rate on shipments to the EU due to disputes over temperature logs and harvest dates, which were managed on paper. This represented over $150,000 in lost revenue annually.

  • The Solution: They implemented AgroBridge across their operation. Harvest events were logged in the field via the mobile app with GPS/timestamps. IoT sensors were placed in shipping containers, automatically logging temperature data as TraceabilityEvents on our platform.

  • The Results (The Transformation):

    • The EU buyer was given read-only access to the immutable, blockchain-verified traceability log for each shipment.
    • In the first six months, the rejection rate dropped to 1%.
    • The producer unlocked a 10% price premium for their "fully verifiable" produce.
    • Quantifiable ROI: The reduction in lost revenue and the price premium resulted in a net positive financial impact of over $250,000 in the first year.

  • Testimonial:

    "With AgroBridge, our batch management time dropped by 45%, but more importantly, we eliminated trust disputes with our buyers. It has completely transformed our export business." ‚Äî CEO, Premium Client, Michoac√°n
